attributes.action: stop  the decision to punish the soldiers firing wax bullets at a mp
attributes.additional_details:
How can these be punished when you can go to the shops and buy items showing a said mp.face  on a dog toy  and other items perfectly legitimately its harmless fun and these men should Not be punished in any way 
Should the makers of spitting image be put in jail too?
attributes.background:
please sign this to show the government and mp.s
That its going way way over the top over  a harmless joke and to stop  punishing  these brave soldiers who are serving in difficult regions of the world to keep us safe and to stand by our armed forces than having a silly witch hunt

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the Army and not the UK Government or Parliament.
